name: Nutpea's Greenhouse
description:
Use Z, X, C and the directional arrows to play!

This is my first game, made for GBJam10. I made it for fun and to learn something about creating games. Its a little bit rough around the edges, doesn't have music but it's a project I dedicated passion and love and I want to hear what you might have to say about it!

When you are a nut, you have a super dash with which you are invulnerable and can run through enemies and when you are a pea shooter, you can... well... shoot peas... But you can dash too!
